channel.title: Partial on Synanthropic Arts
channel.description: Recent content in Partial on Synanthropic Arts

item.title: Albino Rat
item.description: Albino Rat Is a mini-partial suit made to sell at DenFur 2024 Features Two replaceable USB powered blowers All seams on the outside of the face are machine sewn, the ears are sewn onto the face Hidden AirTag pocket Base made from soft expanding polyurethane foam Removable / replaceable 3D eyes (includes additional set of eyes) Soft rubbery ears Socketed replaceable teeth Size adjustable liner Fully castinplace lined interior Shaped neck Unique QR code for care instructions and details on the fabrics used to make him Floor dragger tail with zipper and pocket containing beads so it can easily be washed Custom heart shape embroidery on the tail Loop on tail to allow it to be attached to a belt so it doesn’t drag on the floor NFC tag on left size of muzzle Construction The head is made from cast polyurethane foam with 3D printed eyes and 3D printed teeth and is fully lined, with two high speed blowers.

item.title: Rottweiler
item.description: Rottweiler Is a mini-partial suit made to sell at DenFur 2024 Features Two replaceable USB powered blowers All seams on the outside of the face are machine sewn, the ears are sewn onto the face Hidden AirTag pocket Base made from soft expanding polyurethane foam Removable / replaceable 3D eyes Soft floppy ears Socketed replaceable teeth Size adjustable liner Fully castinplace lined interior Shaped neck Unique QR code for care instructions and details on the fabrics used to make him.

item.title: Lavender Punk Otter
item.description: Lavender Punk Otter Is a mini-partial suit made to sell at DenFur 2024 Features Two replaceable USB powered blowers All seams on the outside of the face are machine sewn Hidden AirTag pocket Base made from soft expanding polyurethane foam Removable / replaceable 3D eyes (includes additional set of eyes) Size adjustable liner Fully castinplace lined interior Shaped neck Unique QR code for care instructions and details on the fabrics used to make him Floor dragger tail with zipper and pocket containing beads so it can easily be washed Custom embroidery on the tail Loop on tail to allow it to be attached to a belt so it doesn’t drag on the floor Construction The head is made from cast polyurethane foam with 3D printed eyes and 3D printed teeth and is fully lined, with two high speed blowers.
